title: URGOT RUNES
body: I know what runes to get for all slots except the cd/mr runes which is best? i see alot of mr  but alot of cd so idk what to get, help?

replies.body: Don't get cdr runes, Urgot gets 40% just by following his basic build (BC + FH) so they will be a waste in the long run. Urgot can spam his Q enough with no CDR inlane. If you feel you really need some CDR, just get it from the masteries.
